tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: American Pie (1/12) Movie CLIP - Penis Tube Sock (1999) HD
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis:
American Pie Movie Clip - watch all clips http://j.mp/wySJhC click to subscribe http://j.mp/sNDUs5
When his mom walks in on him masturbating, Jim (Jason Biggs) tries unsuccessfully to cover it up.
TM & © Universal (2012) Cast: Chris Weitz, Ingrid K. Behrens Director: Paul Weitz, Chris Weitz MOVIECLIPS YouTube Channel: http://j.mp/vqieFG Join our Facebook page: http://j.mp/tb8OMH Follow us on Twitter: http://j.mp/rZzGsm Buy Movie: http://amzn.to/sZ6QCe Producer: Chris Bender, Louis G. Friedman, Chris Moore, Craig Perry, J.B. Rogers, Chris Weitz, Warren Zide, Adam Herz Screenwriter: Adam Herz Film Description: In this coming-of-age comedy, a group of friends at the end of their senior year make a pact to lose their virginity by prom night. In their outrageous attempts to fulfill this mission, they come to some surprising, hilarious and often touching realizations about themselves, their friendships, their notions of love, romance and their relations with the opposite sex.

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Hahaha. I can't tell you how many times growing up I used to watch scrambled porn. You﻿ never were sure if it was a tit or a knee cap but when you're 14, who give a shit.
i love how the dad doesnt really care that much﻿
as soon as his dad walked﻿ in i just cracked up
my bad "what's that?" - been a long time since I saw this at﻿ the movies XD
This situation is a﻿ goddamn disaster lol
Download﻿ this Video downnn(dot)com
LMAO﻿
not all of us﻿ are blessed with a door that can be locked :(
1:00 is what﻿ makes us laugh our heads up! XD
Lmfao﻿

U have﻿ commercials here???
:D
Sorry but I find it awkward when youtube shows a commercial﻿ for a Disney singer RIGHT before this video. xD
"whats that?" BAHAHA!﻿
Spank my hairy ass lmao﻿ has me in stitches :-P
its just ugh bad reception honey, (guy﻿ on tv)-ahh spank my hairy ass what's that? let me take this (removes pillow mom and dad sees penis sock) OMG!
If only i could thumb u up more than once. ﻿
lol﻿
LMFAO "I'm sorry?" - was in﻿ a fit by that point XD
that's why you should always﻿ lock your door.
hahahahaha :D﻿
this happen to me last nite﻿ lol
@poppe191 what's﻿ rule number one?
@salvador cabañas I know it is, I never seen the﻿ whole movie but I wanna see it!
